creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones
description: two figures wearing tailcoats, vests and top hats seated on a bench; figure on L appears to be a woman; back of another figure at L
inscription:
Signature, date and inscription
LRC, in the plate (backwards): [178]
signed: LLC, in the plate (backwards): [Gavarni]; below image, in brown ink: [No 1100/ 10 (illegible) 1838]
title: Mais puisque je vous dis que j'ai un mari. . .
